Posts.Content: Aug 18, 2008 10:59AM luckydeb wrote: I wish I had both of my removed. At the time I was just concerned with trying to save the one. Anyway I would be happier with them both the same and not having to worry about the mammagrams. It's almost been 3 yrs and I still haven't had reconstruction. Lots of other stuff been going on, but I still might have the other removed when I get the reconstruction. I wish you the best in your decision. Deb
Posts.Title: Need to decide one breast or two? catemarie catemarie
